biotools.summary: CARTmath is a mathematical model of CAR-T immunotherapy in preclinical models. It simulates a three-cell mathematical model to describe tumor response to CAR T cell immunotherapy in immunodeficient mouse models.

bioschemas.name: CARTmath
bioschemas.summary: CARTmath is a mathematical model of CAR-T immunotherapy in preclinical models. It simulates a three-cell mathematical model to describe tumor response to CAR T cell immunotherapy in immunodeficient mouse models.
